title: Marsh Island
description: In this first installment of the Hirebomber Series, Phil Pfeiffer is an ex-Army Ranger turned private investigator who can't seem to find a cowardly way to chase wayward husbands. Anything but mild-mannered, Phil finds himself one heart-pounding step ahead of a psychopathic mob hit man. Our hapless hero is accosted by henchmen, chased by ravenous sharks, and even imprisoned. Phil must hope his wit and luck alone can deliver him from the clutches of a mad man.
author: Oliver F. Chase
